short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on the reactions of the user's latest LinkedIn post and send a direct message template to people who appear on that list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
​Start new relationships with people who comment or react to your posts by automatically sending them an icebreaker DM 🦜


💬 Meet Contacts Chrome extension makes it super simple to automate DM sending and grow your social capital. 

🎯​ We help you focus on the people you've never interacted with by keeping track of your audience engagement and interaction history.

🕒 We eliminate the time you lose scraping and organizing the list of people who interact with your content manually. 

📒​ We let you personalize your DM ice-breakers using templates (AI coming soon!)

🤝 Rest assured, we keep our automation platform within LinkedIn's policies limits. 

🔒 We are fully transparent and never collect or sell your private data.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

ABOUT PERMISSIONS

By installing the Meet Contacts extension for Chrome, you are agreeing to the Privacy Policy here: https://meetcontacts.com/privacy-policy/

👉 ​Tabs permission: it is used to automatically open a linkedin tab when the user installs the extension

👉Chrome storage permission: it is used to store user session

👉Host permissions: it is used to summarize and show information to the user. Our chrome extension grabs data from LinkedIn and makes it easier to the user to send messages to their connections

👉Remote code permission: it is used to connect to an API to save user email and password 

These permissions are employed solely to enhance the functionality and usability of our extension, ensuring a better experience for our users while maintaining the utmost security and privacy.
